properties.name: com.c4-soft.springaddons.test.web.default-media-type
properties.description: Default media-type for MockMvcSupport requests ('application/json' by default)

properties.name: com.c4-soft.springaddons.test.web.default-charset
properties.description: Default charset for MockMvcSupport requests ('utf-8' by default)'

properties.name: com.c4-soft.springaddons.test.web.is-secure
properties.description: Should MockMvcSupport requests be issed with https instead of http (false by default)
